name: Heerah
greetingText: I really love your name , by the way!
wishText: I really hope that this msg makes your day and brings a smile to your face,I spent hours working on this project despite the busy schedule I was on.I couldn't resist going through your photos to find the perfect one,and I have to say one thing. Seeing you in a traditional dress left me speechless,Heerah. You look absolutely breathtakingly beautiful.ðŸ’™
